name: Rage With The Machine
description: You and your AI buddy: Squad were having an average day, planning to TAKE OVER THE WORLD, when the military kidnapped Squad! Just when you had finished your plan too, don't you hate it when that happens? Now it is up to you to rescue Squad so that you two can get back to your plot to TAKE OVER THE WORLD! Use the arrow keys or wasd to move, and the mouse to aim and fire! Consists of a single short level.
